name: clonidine hydrochloride

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: Clonidine hydrochloride tablets are indicated in the treatment of hypertension. Clonidine hydrochloride tablets may be employed alone or concomitantly with other antihypertensive agents.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Clonidine Hydrochloride Tablets, USP are supplied as:
                  0.3 mg
                  White rounded off oval shaped, biconvex tablets with score line having "U" and "137" debossed across the score line on one side and plain on other side.
                  
                  NDC: 70518-2203-00
                  NDC: 70518-2203-01
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  
                  Store at 20oto 25oC (68oÂ to 77oF) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
                  625 Kolter Dr. Suite #4 Indiana, PA 1-724-465-8762
